description:
Coagulation tests are becoming common and routine in the clinical laboratory.
They are mainly applied to the pre-operative examination, the pre-thrombosis examination and the monitoring of clinical oral anticoagulants patients. It's requested to test PT/INR, TT, APTT and FIB before patient surgery. ACT is an effective indicator for detecting the anticoagulant effect of heparin and one of the most effective mean to ensure the safety and success of surgery.

 

1 Strip, 6 Reasults, 20μl, 8 minutes

 

Single Test or Combine Test
PT (Prothrombin Time)/ INR (International Normalized Ratio)
TT (Thrombin Time)    ACT (Activated Clotting Time)
FIB (Fibrinogenstrip)   APTT (Activated Partial Thromboplastin Time) MaxMed UAE is the leading supplier of Point of Care Testing Platform (POCT) in Dubai and across the United Arab Emirates. We provide professional Point of Care Testing Platform (POCT) with same-day quotes, fast delivery, installation support, and comprehensive after-sales service. Contact us at +971 55 460 2500 for expert consultation and competitive pricing.
